title: 85/263/EEC: Commission Decision of 26 April 1985 amending Decision 85/228/EEC authorizing the Kingdom of the Netherlands to permit temporarily the marketing of field pea seed not satisfying the requirements of Council Directive 66/401/EEC
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 26 April 1985
amending Decision 85/228/EEC authorizing the Kingdom of the Netherlands to permit temporarily the marketing of field pea seed not satisfying the requirements of Council Directive 66/401/EEC
(85/263/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Decision 85/228/EEC is hereby amended as follows:
1. In Article 1, the quantity '950 tonnes' is replaced by '1 450 tonnes'.
2. In Article 2, the quantity '950 tonnes' is replaced by '1 450 tonnes'.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 April 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No 125, 11. 7. 1966, p. 2298/66.
(2) OJ No L 16, 19. 1. 1985, p. 41.
(3) OJ No L 104, 16. 4. 1985, p. 19.
